title: Leader in Renewable Energy
description: In 2021, Bhutan achieved 100% renewable electricity output, with 99.99% of its electricity produced from hydroelectric sources.

title: Minimal Informal Payments
description: As of 2015, only 0.1% of firms in Bhutan reported making informal payments to public officials, indicating low corruption levels.

title: Efficient Business Licensing
description: In 2015, it took just 1.2 days to obtain an operating license in Bhutan, showcasing an efficient business environment.

title: High External Debt Burden
description: In 2023, Bhutan's present value of external debt was 332.14% of its exports of goods, services, and primary income, indicating a high debt burden.

title: Low Intellectual Property Receipts
description: In 2024, Bhutan had negative charges for the use of intellectual property, with receipts amounting to -$8,581.42.
